document.docAuthor: Triapitsyn, Serguei V., Koponen, Martti, Vikberg, Veli & Várkonyi, Gergely
document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy, annotated new records and a checklist of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) of Finland, with description of a new species of Eustochus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy, annotated new records and a checklist of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) of Finland, with description of a new species of Eustochus

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Entomology Research Museum, Department of Entomology, University of California, Riverside, California, 92521, USA;
Finnish Environment Institute SYKE, Biodiversity Centre, FI- 88900, Kuhmo, Finland; e-mail: gergely. varkonyi @ ymparisto. fi

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined. N :
Nurmijärvi, M. Koponen (6707:3381), 6.x.1996 , riverside ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).Rajamäki (6715:3376), 17.vii.1981 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Nukari (6714:3385), 5.viii.1990 , riverside ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Siuntio, Pikkala (6668:3349), 30.viii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).

Distribution. Palaearctic ( Belgium , Bulgaria , France , Germany , Greece , Iran , Italy , Japan , Netherlands , Russia , Serbia , Sweden , United Kingdom ), Australasian ( Australia , New Zealand ), Nearctic ( Canada , USA ), and Neotropical
( Chile ) Regions (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b; T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ et al. 2020a). New species record for Finland .

Material examined. N :
Nurmijärvi (6715:3376), 18.viii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Distribution. Palaearctic Region ( France , Germany , Netherlands , Poland , Romania , Spain , United Kingdom ) (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b). New species record for Finland .

Material examined. Sa :
Mikkeli, Otava (6835:3503), 18.viii.2008 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); Tusku (6843:3512), 18.vii.2009 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Kb :
Tohmajärvi,Vinska,Anttila (6908:3660), 18.vii.1982 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Uukuniemi (6852:3655), 24.vi.1983 , M. Pulkkinen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Lkor :
Savukoski, UKK park, Jaurujoki, 5.vi.–1. vii.2014 , pitfall traps, gravel bank, J. Salmela ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Distribution. Palaearctic Region ( Belgium , Denmark , France , Germany , Greece , Italy , Russia , Sweden , United Kingdom ) (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b). New species record for Finland .

Material examined. N :
Helsinki, M. Koponen: Viikki (6680:3390), 12.viii.1980 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); 21.viii.1980 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Inkoo

(6664:3335), 30.viii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Lapinjärvi (6723:3455), 16.viii.1981 , meadow by shore, M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Nurmijärvi, M. Koponen: Nummenpää, 1.ix.1990 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); Teponlampi (6702:3378), 18.vii.1992 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); (6708:3376), 8.viii.1986 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); Ylöstalon forest (6705:3380), 23.viii.1992 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); Kiljava (6712:3373), 23.vi.1987 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ), 25.vii.1992 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Siuntio, Pikkala (6668:3349), 30.viii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
St :
Kokemäki, Peipohja, 29.v.1962 , suction trap, O. Heikinheimo ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Ta :
Jämsä, Kauranoro (6853:3412), 29.viii.1991 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Janakkala, Kalpalinna, 60°55′37″N 24°35′49″E , 101 m , 8.vii.2017 , S. V. Triapitsyn & V. Vikberg ( 1 ♀ , UCRC ).
Sa :
Mikkeli [rural municipality], M. Koponen: Soikkala (6830:3501), 27.vi.1992 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); Majalahdentie (6840:3506), 2.viii.1996 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Ristiina,Ylölänkylä,Alatalo (6826:3502), M.Koponen: 31.viii.1985 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ), 21.vii.1989 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Sb :
Maaninka, O. Heikinkeimo,suction trap: 19.viii.1962 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ), 7.ix.1962 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ), 8.ix.1962 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Om :
Alajärvi (6991:3334), 1.viii.1995 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Oba :
Ylikiiminki (7232:3461), 6.vii.2000 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Ks :
Kuusamo, Iso-Kuusikko (7371:3609), 3.vii.1998 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).

Distribution. Palaearctic ( Austria , Belgium , Bulgaria , China , France , Germany , Greece , Iran , Ireland , Israel , Italy , Kyrgyzstan , Netherlands , Romania , Russia , Spain , Sweden , United Kingdom ) and Nearctic ( Greenland , USA ) Regions (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b). New species record for Finland .

Material examined. N :
Nurmijärvi (6707:3381), 6.x.1996 , riverside, M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Sipoo, Östersundom (6684:3400), 26.ix.1985 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Sa :
Mikkeli [rural municipality], Hietala (6830:3501), 17.viii.1980 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Ristiina, Ylölänkylä, Alatalo (6826:3502), 2.viii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Oa :
Ilmajoki, Hiidenhaudanmaa (6970:3263), 9.vii.1999 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Le :
Enontekiö, Hetta (7592:3360), 3.vii.1982 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).

Distribution. Palaearctic Region ( Austria , Bulgaria , Greece , Italy , Kyrgyzstan , North Macedonia, Republic of Korea , Russia , Spain , Switzerland , United Kingdom ) (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b). New species record for Finland .

Material examined. Ab :
Turku, Paattinen (6727:3245), 24.v.1998 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
N :
Nurmijärvi, M. Koponen:(6708:3382), riverside, 17.v.1998 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ); Ruostesuo (6712:3381), 9.viii.1992 ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Porvoo [rural municipality], Sannäs (6690:3431), 3.vi.1982 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ). Siuntio, Pikkala (6668:3349), 30.viii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♂ , FMNH ).
Ta :
Hattula, Parola (6774:3356), 22.viii.1981 , railway trackside, M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Sa :
Mikkeli [rural municipality], Majalahdentie (6840:3506), 2.viii.1996 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♂ , FMNH ).
Oa :
Ilmajoki, Hiidenhaudanmaa (6970:3263), 9.vii.1999 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).

Distribution. Palaearctic ( Belgium , Bulgaria , France , Ireland , Israel , Italy , Kyrgyzstan , Netherlands , Russia , Spain , Sweden , United Kingdom ), Australasian ( New Zealand ), and Neotropical ( Argentina , Chile ) Regions (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b). New species record for Finland .

Anagrus ( Anagrus ) subfuscus
Fඈൾ*©ඌඍൾ*© (1847: 214–215). Type locality (of the neotype designated by C*üංൺඉඉංඇං 1989: 109): Belgium , Flemish Brabant, Leuven, Egenhoven. Nൾඈඍඒඉൾ: ♀ [ISNB], examined (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 1998).

?
Anagrus ( Anagrus ) ensifer
Dൾൻൺඎ*ö*üൾ (1948: 136–137). Type locality: Belgium , Flemish Brabant, Tervuren,Vossem.Hඈඅඈඍඒඉൾ: ♀ (ISNB), examined (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 1998).

Material examined. N :
Nurmijärvi, Kaanaanmetsä (6704:3381), 1.vii.1992 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♂ 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Sa :
Mikkeli, Hietala (6680:3381), 12.vii.1981 , M. Koponen ( 1 ♀ , FMNH ).
Ta :
Janakkala, Kalpalinna (6757:8369), 7.vii.2017 , V. Vikberg ( 1 ♀ , VVCT ).

Remarks. Some female specimens from Finland , more or less attributable to
A. subfuscus
, as defined by C*üංൺඉඉංඇං (1989) and T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ (2015b), have an mps on F3 of at least one of the antennae and the ovipositor length: protibia length ratio of 3.5–4.0, thus being intermediate between
A. subfuscus
and
A. ensifer
. That may be indicative to their potential conspecificity which, however, will need to be further demonstrated by a combination of detailed morphometric and molecular studies that are beyond the scope of this communication.According to T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ (2015b), females of the former have one mps on F3 and the ovipositor length: protibia length ratio of 3.0–3.4 whereas those of the latter nominal species lack an mps on F3 and have the ovipositor length: protibia length ratio of 3.9–4.0. However, presence or absence of mps on F3 of the female antenna may vary in several other species of
Anagrus
(T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b), such as
A. incarnatus Haliday, 1833
(T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇet al. 2018). Distribution. Palaearctic ( Belgium , Bulgaria , Denmark , France , Germany , Greece , Italy , Japan , Poland , Romania , Russia , Spain , Switzerland , United Kingdom ), Nearctic ( Canada , USA ), and Neotropical ( Argentina ) regions (T*©ංൺඉංඍඌඒඇ 2015b). New species record for Finland .
